6301 De Soto Avenue
Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Located in Warner Center, Woodland Hills, with easy access to De Soto Blvd and Victory Blvd, Carillon Apartment Homes is just minutes away from Pierce College, as well as all the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby Los Angeles has to offer.
Amenities Include:
Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
Complimentary gated guest parking
Relaxing pool featuring open air cabanas, lounge seating, spa and BBQ grills                                                                                         Featured amenity
Black granite-look kitchen countertops                                                                                        Featured amenity
Open concept inviting living spaces
Business center with PC workstations, printer, copier and Wi-Fi access
24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity
Large dog run space with walking trail and grassy areas
Convenient in-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity
Warm cherry cabinetry with brushed nickel hardware
Oversized walk-in closets with storage
Easy access to the 101 Freeway, Warner Center Transit Station and Metro Orange Line                                                                                         Featured amenity
